mainboard.name: Remove Soul
mainboard.oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.

mainboard.name: Mischievous Chimera
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, Mischievous Chimera deals 1 damage to each opponent. Scry 1.

mainboard.name: Puncture Blast
mainboard.oracle_text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Puncture Blast deals 3 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Fateful End
mainboard.oracle_text: Fateful End deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1.

mainboard.name: Sunbird's Invocation
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's mana value. You may cast a spell with mana value X or less from among cards revealed this way without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

mainboard.name: Stinging Lionfish
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.

mainboard.name: Lightning Bolt
mainboard.oracle_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Young Pyromancer
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

mainboard.name: Warcry Phoenix
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, return Warcry Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

mainboard.name: Terramorphic Expanse
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Raging Goblin
mainboard.oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

mainboard.name: Capricious Efreet
mainboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target nonland permanent you control and up to two target nonland permanents you don't control. Destroy one of them at random.

mainboard.name: Rabbit Battery
mainboard.oracle_text:
Haste
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
Reconfigure {R} ({R}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

mainboard.name: Reinforced Ronin
mainboard.oracle_text:
Haste
At the beginning of your end step, return Reinforced Ronin to its owner's hand.
Channel — {1}{R}, Discard Reinforced Ronin: Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Naiad of Hidden Coves
mainboard.oracle_text: As long as it's not your turn, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

mainboard.name: Mark of Mutiny
mainboard.oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

mainboard.name: Highland Lake
mainboard.oracle_text:
Highland Lake enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

mainboard.name: Condescend
mainboard.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mainboard.name: Discover the Impossible
mainboard.oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Exile one of them face down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost if it's an instant spell with mana value 2 or less. If you don't, put that card into your hand.

mainboard.name: Frostboil Snarl
mainboard.oracle_text:
As Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

mainboard.name: Rigging Runner
mainboard.oracle_text:
First strike
Raid — Rigging Runner enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

mainboard.name: Enigma Drake
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Enigma Drake's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

mainboard.name: Invade the City
mainboard.oracle_text: Amass Zombies X, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

mainboard.name: Comet Storm
mainboard.oracle_text:
Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Choose any target, then choose another target for each time this spell was kicked. Comet Storm deals X damage to each of them.

mainboard.name: Ral, Storm Conduit
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Ral, Storm Conduit deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
